name: EuroStocks
author: EuroStocks

sections.description:
Discover the EuroStocks import software: your key to a virtual car showroom! This software effortlessly enables you to showcase over 300,000 German cars on your website, without making significant changes to your site.

Traditional car dealerships face challenges in a world where consumers know exactly what they want. EuroStocks offers a solution: easily import cars from Germany, expand your inventory, and remain competitive in a market where online shopping is the norm.

How does it work? EuroStocks retrieves real-time data from Mobile.de and adapts it to your local market. The selection only includes cars with known CO2 emissions, offered by recognized car dealerships, and is presented with all-in prices including any cost related to importing the vehicle.

The software seamlessly integrates with your website via our WordPress plugin, allowing you to offer customers a wider range of options and save costs without major changes to your site.

Why showcase German offerings? The number of imported cars is growing, while traditional car dealerships struggle with empty showrooms. With EuroStocks, you retain website traffic, and visitors benefit from an extensive selection of cars.

Curious? Leave your details for a free demo! EuroStocks also offers customization options, such as excluding certain brands or models, displaying vehicles from a specific year, and filters for specifications such as interior and lease terms.

Please note: This plugin requires a paid subscription to use.

External libraries used in the EuroStocks plugin:
– Owl Carousel, to show car photos in a carousel
– FS Lightbox to show photo lightboxes
– Popper JS Required by Tippy JS
– Tippy JS to provide tool tip feature

The plugin uses the EuroStocks API to pull car assortment from EuroStocks. An active API key is required.
https://docs.eurostocks.com/import-api-v2
sections.installation:
Upload the EuroStocks plugin to your website, activate it, and then enter your EuroStocks.com API key.
Cars settings page you can select the cars makes that you want to display.
On the general settings page you can find the shortcodes to use.
sections.changelog:
3.1.15

Additional sorting options
Bugfix contact form duplicate messages
New options for car options filter

3.1.14

Option to only show lease pricing
Improved image sizes
Improved filters options, trailer coupling
Support for newer cars 2024
Option to hide contact form fields

3.1.13

Improved onboarding experience
Improved way of getting the car models
Added Analytics
BPM is now also shown for NL 21%

Make listing area clickable

3.1.11

Add transport costs when available

3.1.10

Custom input to contact messages

Update PDF Library version

3.1.6

Fix to PK display

3.1.5

UX improvements on admin screen

Validation fixes

Security improvements

3.0.1

CSS styling update
Change Price, KM and build year to select
Add min build year
Add max KM
Add powered by display option
VAT filter to checkbox
Add mail to client
Add option to place CTA on each listings page

3.0.0

Initial WordPress repository release

short_description: Looking to offer car import services to your customers? Let them seamlessly search through over 300000 vehicles directly on your website!
